name: Stuck in a muddle with you
name_original: Stuck in a muddle with you
description:
A road-movie on the spot.

2 girls. 4 days. 6 bands. 8 chapters. 9 endings. 7 374 words. 307200 pixels.

Stuck In a Muddle With You was made for the #MysticWestern jam and is a prequel to 'Til Cows Tear Us Apart, made for the #SpaceCowboy jam two years ago.

You can play the first version of 'Til Cows Tear Us Apart on Itch.io
Or the web version on Kongregate

Because of mild/strong language and low-res nudity this game might not be considered friendly for all-ages. Also, there's no auto-restart yet.I might add it later if I figure out how to do.

Since it was made in June and is all about love, I also submitted Stuck in a Muddle With You to the #iluJam2. I hope it's OK.
